allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: AIOS governance framework with type/lint fixes

AI governance and policy framework for human-in-the-loop controls:
- Intent classification \(Comms, Legal, HR, Finance, General\)
- Risk detection \(PII, Legal Contract, Public Statement, Financial\)
- Policy evaluation with hierarchical rules \(Constitutional > Org > Dept\)
- Simulation mode for dry-run testing

All 54 tests passing, mypy strict mode clean, ruff lint clean.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add FastAPI REST API for governance framework

New endpoints:
- GET /health - Health check
- POST /classify - Intent classification
- POST /risks - Risk detection
- POST /governance/evaluate - Full governance evaluation
- GET/POST /policies - Policy management
- POST /simulate - Single simulation
- POST /simulate/batch - Batch simulation

Files added:
- packages/api/__init__.py - FastAPI app with all endpoints
- packages/api/config.py - Settings via pydantic-settings
- run_api.py - Convenience run script
- tests/test_api.py - 14 endpoint tests

All 68 tests passing, mypy strict clean, ruff lint clean.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add AIOS Build Specification - source of truth document

Comprehensive documentation including:
- Architecture principles and mandatory pipeline
- HITL modes and policy-as-code specifications
- Module specifications \(Concierge, Governance, Simulation\)
- Engineering quality rules \(CGI-grade\)
- API endpoints and usage
- CGI compliance checklist
- Future milestones roadmap
- Original build commands and configuration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
